title: Jar And Cover
markings: On underside of base, 44 written in black
dimensions: H x diam.: 19 x 8 cm (7 1/2 x 3 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Gustave Gilbert
description: Tall hexagonal form decorated in a semi-matte black finish with peweter colored squares and dark grey lines that form squares with pewter sections.  Rounded lid with similar decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover.
H x diam.: 19 x 8 cm (7 1/2 x 3 1/8 in.). Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Gustave Gilbert. 1967-85-6-a,b.
